  </nav></div>		  <!--main menu region end-->
		
    
		<div id="columns" class="clearfix">
			<div class="hg-container">
				<div id="content-column" role="main">
					<div class="content-inner">
					  <div class="breadcrumb"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/" >HOME</a> <span>&#47;</span> <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq" >FAQ</a> <span>&#47;</span> </div>
						
													<section id="main-content">
								<a name="main-content"></a>
																									<header id="main-content-header">
																					<h1 id="page-title">
												Graduate											</h1>
																													</header>
																
																	<div id="content">
										<div class="view view-os-faq view-id-os_faq view-display-id-page view-dom-id-e80fdb04cc2981c2e6a2e57b165c863f">
        
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first">
    <article id="node-1000166" class="node node-faq node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="toggle node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/what-latest-information-unionization-graduate-students-harvard" rel="bookmark">What is the latest information on the unionization of graduate students at Harvard?</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="os-slider node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>&#13;
	To keep current on the unionization of graduate students at Harvard, please refer to <a data-url="https://provost.harvard.edu/studentvote" href="https://provost.harvard.edu/studentvote" title="">the page managed by the Office of the Provost.</a> Please note that the provost also sends direct communications to graduate students, faculty, and other members of the Harvard community.&#13;
</p>&#13;
 <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/what-latest-information-unionization-graduate-students-harvard" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about What is the latest information on the unionization of graduate students at Harvard?</span></a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-2 views-row-even">
    <article id="node-982876" class="node node-faq node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="toggle node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/can-i-teach-years-g5-and-g6-priority-student" rel="bookmark">Can I teach in years G5 and G6, as a priority student?</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="os-slider node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>GSAS made some recent changes which allow students to shift their priority years to any combination within G3, G4, G5, and G6 years. This allows students in the Study of Religion to do research work earlier in their program, if they have secured alternative sources of funding. Read the guidance here: https://gsas.harvard.edu/news/stories/gsas-implements-enhancements-funding-packages.</p> <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/can-i-teach-years-g5-and-g6-priority-student" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Can I teach in years G5 and G6, as a priority student?</span></a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-3 views-row-odd">
    <article id="node-932736" class="node node-faq node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="toggle node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/do-you-require-writing-sample" rel="bookmark">Is a writing sample required for applicants?</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="os-slider node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>For applicants to the Ph.D. program in the Study of Religion, a writing sample is required. The 10-page limit/2500-word limit refers to the main body of the paper and does not include bibliographies.</p></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-4 views-row-even">
    <article id="node-916981" class="node node-faq node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="toggle node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/how-do-i-apply-phd-program-study-religion-harvard-university" rel="bookmark">How do I apply to the Ph.D. Program in the Study of Religion at Harvard University?</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="os-slider node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>Please go to <a data-url="http://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/pages/apply-phd" href="http://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/pages/apply-phd" target="_blank" title="">"Apply PhD"</a> and follow instructions on applying to the Graduate School of Arts and Sciences at Harvard University.</p> <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/how-do-i-apply-phd-program-study-religion-harvard-university" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about How do I apply to the Ph.D. Program in the Study of Religion at Harvard University?</span></a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-5 views-row-odd">
    <article id="node-896466" class="node node-faq node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="toggle node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/can-doctoral-students-defer-funding" rel="bookmark">Can doctoral students defer funding?</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="os-slider node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>The GSAS made some changes to their funding structure for doctoral students entering 2016-17 and beyond. These allow for some deferrals of teaching fellowships to later G years and other enhancements. <a href="https://gsas.harvard.edu/news/stories/gsas-implements-enhancements-funding-packages" data-url="https://gsas.harvard.edu/news/stories/gsas-implements-enhancements-funding-packages">Read more.</a></p> <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/can-doctoral-students-defer-funding" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Can doctoral students defer funding?</span></a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-6 views-row-even">
    <article id="node-892841" class="node node-faq node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="toggle node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/what-are-family-accommodations-graduate-students" rel="bookmark">What are "Family Accommodations" for graduate students?</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="os-slider node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>The Graduate School of Arts and Sciences offers accommodations to students who are anticipating the birth or adoption of a child. You may review the policy here: <strong><a href="https://gsas.harvard.edu/student-life/harvard-resources/parental-accommodation-and-financial-support" data-url="https://gsas.harvard.edu/student-life/harvard-resources/parental-accommodation-and-financial-support">https://gsas.harvard.edu/student-life/harvard-resources/parental-accommodation-and-financial-support</a></strong></p> <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/what-are-family-accommodations-graduate-students" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about What are "Family Accommodations" for graduate students?</span></a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-7 views-row-odd">
    <article id="node-892836" class="node node-faq node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="toggle node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/how-does-my-advisor-lift-hold" rel="bookmark">How does my advisor lift the "hold"?</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="os-slider node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>Faculty advisors can<a href="http://about.my.harvard.edu/study-card-advisors" data-url="http://about.my.harvard.edu/study-card-advisors"> review instruction here for lifting a registration hold</a>.</p> <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/how-does-my-advisor-lift-hold" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about How does my advisor lift the "hold"?</span></a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-8 views-row-even">
    <article id="node-892626" class="node node-faq node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="toggle node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/when-are-stipends-disbursed" rel="bookmark">When are stipends disbursed?</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="os-slider node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>Incoming new graduate students receive their stipend disbursement on orientation day. Returning graduate students are issued stipend the first of September for the fall term. If you have not set up direct deposit, the check will be mailed on that date.</p></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-9 views-row-odd">
    <article id="node-598186" class="node node-faq node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="toggle node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/can-i-pursue-degree-law-and-study-religion" rel="bookmark">Can I pursue a degree in Law and the Study of Religion?</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="os-slider node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>Harvard offers a coordinated JD/PhD Program which is designed for students interested in completing interdisciplinary work and is founded on the belief that students’ legal studies and their arts and sciences graduate studies can be mutually enriched through this pursuit. Students completing the coordinated program receive a JD from Harvard Law School (HLS) and a PhD from the <a href="http://www.gsas.harvard.edu/">Graduate School of Arts and Sciences</a> (GSAS). It is expected that these students will be strong candidates for teaching posts at law schools and in arts and sciences programs</p> <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/can-i-pursue-degree-law-and-study-religion" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Can I pursue a degree in Law and the Study of Religion?</span></a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-10 views-row-even views-row-last">
    <article id="node-476446" class="node node-faq node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="toggle node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/do-i-need-mail-my-transcripts" rel="bookmark">Do I need to mail my transcripts by the application deadline?</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="os-slider node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>When applying to the Doctoral Program, the Graduate School of Arts and Sciences requires that you upload a copy of your transcript from each college/university attended with your online application. An official transcript showing the conferral of the undergraduate degree is required to register in the Graduate School. An official transcript that differs from the application copy may bar an admitted candidate from registering.</p></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
    </div>
  
      <div class="item-list"><ul class="pager"><li class="pager-previous">&nbsp;</li><li class="pager-current">1 of 2</li><li class="pager-next"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/faq-taxonomy/graduate?page=1">››</a></li></ul></div>  
  
  
  
  
</div>									</div>
								
							</section><!--main content ends-->
											</div>
				</div>

					<div class="content-inner">
					  <div class="breadcrumb"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/" >HOME</a> <span>&#47;</span> <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq" >FAQ</a> <span>&#47;</span> </div>
						
													<section id="main-content">
								<a name="main-content"></a>
																									<header id="main-content-header">
																					<h1 id="page-title">
												Graduate											</h1>
																													</header>
																
																	<div id="content">
										<div class="view view-os-faq view-id-os_faq view-display-id-page view-dom-id-232a04af6db52a9edc8f6f53a0728e8b">
        
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first">
    <article id="node-86751" class="node node-faq node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="toggle node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/do-i-need-submit-my-gre-scores-application-deadline" rel="bookmark">Do I need to submit my GRE scores by the application deadline?</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="os-slider node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>Yes. Applications that do not have GRE scores are considered incomplete. Refer to the <a href="http://www.gsas.harvard.edu/prospective_students/application_instructions_and_information.php" data-url="http://www.gsas.harvard.edu/prospective_students/application_instructions_and_information.php">GSAS Application Instructions</a> for more details on submitting scores.</p> <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/do-i-need-submit-my-gre-scores-application-deadline" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Do I need to submit my GRE scores by the application deadline?</span></a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-2 views-row-even">
    <article id="node-64191" class="node node-faq node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="toggle node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/what-average-length-doctoral-programs-study-religion" rel="bookmark">What is the average length of study for doctoral candidates?</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="os-slider node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>Program guidelines stipulate that students should complete their degrees in seven years. Some students may complete their doctoral programs sooner. Various factors, such as language study or research abroad, will affect the length of a student's program.</p></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-3 views-row-odd">
    <article id="node-64186" class="node node-faq node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="toggle node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/what-are-opportunities-teaching" rel="bookmark">What are the opportunities for teaching?</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="os-slider node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>As part of the funding offered to admitted students, teaching fellowships are made available beginning in year three. Teaching experience is integral to the doctoral program. Teaching Fellowship positions are most often found through the Divinity School and in the Faculty of Arts and Sciences. Additional teaching opportunities include work as junior and senior tutors with small groups or individuals majoring in religion, as well as work with HarvardX and the Harvard Extension School. Every effort is made to give students the best information for securing these teaching</p> <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/what-are-opportunities-teaching" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about What are the opportunities for teaching?</span></a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-4 views-row-even">
    <article id="node-64181" class="node node-faq node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="toggle node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/addition-harvards-financial-aid-are-there-other-fellowships-available" rel="bookmark">In addition to Harvard's financial aid, are there other fellowships available?</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="os-slider node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>Yes. Once you are a student, you are eligible to apply for a range of fellowships at various stages in your program, for example, summer language study grants, traveling fellowships for research abroad, other research grants, and dissertation completion fellowships.</p></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-5 views-row-odd">
    <article id="node-64176" class="node node-faq node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="toggle node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/what-about-financial-aid" rel="bookmark">What financial aid is available for doctoral students?</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="os-slider node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>All admissions decisions are made without knowing the financial need of the applicants, so that financial status plays no role in the assessment of one's suitability for admission. <a data-url="https://gsas.harvard.edu/financial-support/funding-aid" href="https://gsas.harvard.edu/financial-support/funding-aid" target="_blank" title="">Please see the current standard funding package on the Graduate School of Arts and Sciences website.</a></p> <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/what-about-financial-aid" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about What financial aid is available for doctoral students?</span></a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-6 views-row-even">
    <article id="node-64171" class="node node-faq node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="toggle node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/what-most-important-application-process" rel="bookmark">What is most important in the Ph.D. application process?</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="os-slider node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>It is very important that you write a clear and informative <strong>statement of purpose</strong>. You should be able to talk in some detail about your academic interests, what led you to them, and what you envision the focus of your program at Harvard would be. As much as possible, you should familiarize yourself with the faculty and resources at Harvard in your proposed area of study. Reviewers of your application will look for a good "fit" between what you want to do and what Harvard has to offer.<br /><br /><strong>Academic preparation</strong> is also extremely important, and reviewers</p> <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/what-most-important-application-process" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about What is most important in the Ph.D. application process?</span></a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-7 views-row-odd">
    <article id="node-64161" class="node node-faq node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="toggle node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/masters-degree-required-application-doctoral-programs" rel="bookmark">Is a Master's degree required for application?</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="os-slider node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>While a master's degree is not a requirement, it is a distinct advantage in the application process, and in fact, most students admitted to the Ph.D. program have already earned master's degrees. The background gained from one or two years of study beyond the undergraduate level allows a student to enter a doctoral program prepared to do the advanced work required for a Ph.D. Students with an undergraduate record of <em>high quality</em> and <em>extensive academic preparation relevant to their statement of purpose</em> may be admitted with only a B.A.</p></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-8 views-row-even views-row-last">
    <article id="node-64156" class="node node-faq node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="toggle node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/what-required-application-doctoral-program" rel="bookmark">What is required for application to the Ph.D. program?</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="os-slider node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p><strong>T</strong>he program is highly competitive – we can accept only 5-7% of applicants to the PhD. For that reason, we look for the most capable applicants, with excellent credentials in all areas.</p>&#13;
<ul><li>A <strong>writing sample</strong> of no more than 10 pages in length.</li>&#13;
<li><strong>Transcripts</strong> from all undergraduate and graduate programs attended.</li>&#13;
<li><strong>Recommendations</strong> from three faculty members who can speak to your academic capabilities.</li>&#13;
<li><strong>GRE's</strong>. The basic exams (verbal, analytical, and math), but not any</li></ul><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/what-required-application-doctoral-program" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about What is required for application to the Ph.D. program?</span></a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
    </div>
  
      <div class="item-list"><ul class="pager"><li class="pager-previous"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/faq-taxonomy/graduate">‹‹</a></li><li class="pager-current">2 of 2</li><li class="pager-next">&nbsp;</li></ul></div>  
  
  
  
  
</div>									</div>
								
							</section><!--main content ends-->
											</div>
				</div>

				
								  <!--sidebar second region beg-->
				  <div class="region region-sidebar-second sidebar"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><section id="block-boxes-1372193109" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_taxonomy_fbt"  module="boxes" delta="1372193109"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">FAQs by Program</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1372193109' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div class="item-list"><ul><li class="term-graduate"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/faq-taxonomy/graduate"  class="" title="">Graduate <span class="count">(18)</span></a></li><li class="term-undergraduate"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/faq-taxonomy/undergraduate"  class="" title="">Undergraduate <span class="count">(7)</span></a></li></ul></div></div></div></div>
  </div></section><section id="block-boxes-os-faq-sv-list" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_sv_list_box"  module="boxes" delta="os_faq_sv_list"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">Recent FAQs</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-os_faq_sv_list' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div id='box-os_faq_sv_list-page' data-page='1' data-delta='os_faq_sv_list' class='os-sv-list os_sv_list_box sv-list-faq sv-list-view-title sv-list-layout-list sv-grid-3'><div class="item-list"><ul><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/what-latest-information-unionization-graduate-students-harvard"  target="_top">What is the latest information on the unionization of graduate students at Harvard?</a></li><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/can-i-teach-years-g5-and-g6-priority-student"  target="_top">Can I teach in years G5 and G6, as a priority student?</a></li><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/do-you-require-writing-sample"  target="_top">Is a writing sample required for applicants?</a></li><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/how-do-i-apply-phd-program-study-religion-harvard-university"  target="_top">How do I apply to the Ph.D. Program in the Study of Religion at Harvard University?</a></li><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/can-doctoral-students-defer-funding"  target="_top">Can doctoral students defer funding?</a></li><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/what-are-family-accommodations-graduate-students"  target="_top">What are "Family Accommodations" for graduate students?</a></li></ul></div></div><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq"  class="more-link">More</a></div></div></div>
  </div></section></div></div>				  <!--sidebar second region end-->

		  <div class="branding-left"><a href="http://www.harvard.edu" ><img src="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/profiles/openscholar/themes/hwpi_basetheme/images/harvard-logo.png" width="235" height="32" alt="Harvard Logo" /></a></div><div class="branding-right"><a href="http://www.harvard.edu" >HARVARD.EDU</a></div>		</div>

<div id="page" class="container page header-main header-right content-none footer-left">
	<div id="page-wrapper">

		
					<!--header regions beg-->
			<header id="header" class="clearfix" role="banner">
			 <div id="header-container">
				 <div id="header-panels" class="at-panel gpanel panel-display three-col clearfix">
					  					  <div class="region region-header-second"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><div id="block-boxes-site-info" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_boxes_site_info no-title"  module="boxes" delta="site_info"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-site_info' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><h1><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/" >Committee on the Study of Religion</a></h1>
    
    <p>
    </p></div></div></div>
  </div></div></div></div>					  					  <div class="region region-header-third"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><div id="block-os-secondary-menu" class="block block-os no-title"  module="os" delta="secondary-menu"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
  
  <div class="block-content content"><ul class="nice-menu nice-menu-down nice-menu-secondary-menu" id="nice-menu-secondary-menu"><li class="menu-22511 menu-path-faq  first   odd  "><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq"  title="List of FAQs" class="active">FAQ</a></li><li class="menu-2605 menu-path-node-63151   even  "><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/pages/apply-phd" >Apply PhD</a></li><li class="menu-6668 menu-path-studyofreligionfasharvardedu-pages-forms   odd  "><a href="http://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/pages/forms"  title="For Current Students &amp; Faculty">Forms</a></li><li class="menu-2603 menu-path-node-57086   even   last "><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/pages/contact" >Contact</a></li></ul>
</div>
  </div></div><div id="block-boxes-solr-search-box" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_search_solr_search_box no-title"  module="boxes" delta="solr_search_box"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-solr_search_box' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><form class="search-block-form" action="/faq/faq-taxonomy/undergraduate" method="post" id="search-block-form" accept-charset="UTF-8"><div><div class="container-inline">
  <div class="form-item form-type-textfield form-item-search-block-form">

		<div id="columns" class="clearfix">
			<div class="hg-container">
				<div id="content-column" role="main">
					<div class="content-inner">
					  <div class="breadcrumb"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/" >HOME</a> <span>&#47;</span> <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq" >FAQ</a> <span>&#47;</span> </div>
						
													<section id="main-content">
								<a name="main-content"></a>
																									<header id="main-content-header">
																					<h1 id="page-title">
												Undergraduate											</h1>
																													</header>
																
																	<div id="content">
										<div class="view view-os-faq view-id-os_faq view-display-id-page view-dom-id-6e6011d4e4323a12c199d42690fc51b7">
        
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first">
    <article id="node-892836" class="node node-faq node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="toggle node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/how-does-my-advisor-lift-hold" rel="bookmark">How does my advisor lift the "hold"?</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="os-slider node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>Faculty advisors can<a href="http://about.my.harvard.edu/study-card-advisors" data-url="http://about.my.harvard.edu/study-card-advisors"> review instruction here for lifting a registration hold</a>.</p> <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/how-does-my-advisor-lift-hold" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about How does my advisor lift the "hold"?</span></a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-2 views-row-even">
    <article id="node-63991" class="node node-faq node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="toggle node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/what-happens-if-i%E2%80%99ve-been-away-harvard-and-requirements-my-field-changed-while-i-was" rel="bookmark">What happens if I’ve been away from Harvard and the requirements for my field changed while I was gone?</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="os-slider node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>Normally you will be allowed to complete your work in the Study of Religion under the guidelines that existed when you entered the program. See the <a href="pages/coursework">Coursework section for historical handbooks</a>.</p></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-3 views-row-odd">
    <article id="node-63921" class="node node-faq node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="toggle node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/if-i-transfer-religion-another-concentration-sophomore-or-junior-can-i-get-credit" rel="bookmark">Can I transfer from another concentration as a sophomore or junior and get credit for tutorials taken in other departments?</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="os-slider node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>Yes, this is possible. Make an appointment to see the Director of Undergraduate Studies, and be sure to bring with you syllabi from your other tutorials and a completed <a href="pages/concentration-plans">Plan of Study from the Study of Religion</a>.</p></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-4 views-row-even">
    <article id="node-63896" class="node node-faq node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="toggle node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/can-courses-%E2%80%9Cdouble-count%E2%80%9D-meet-both-gen-ed-and-concentration-requirements" rel="bookmark">Can courses “double-count” for both Gen Ed and Religion requirements?</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="os-slider node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>Yes!</p></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-5 views-row-odd">
    <article id="node-63891" class="node node-faq node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="toggle node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/can-i-concentrate-religion-and-still-go-law-or-medical-school" rel="bookmark">Can I concentrate in religion and still go to law or medical school?</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="os-slider node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Yes! Many of our concentrators do. Prepare to take the classes necessary for graduate school in your chosen field in addition to fulfilling our concentration requirements.</div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-6 views-row-even">
    <article id="node-63851" class="node node-faq node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="toggle node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/why-should-i-concentrate-religion-0" rel="bookmark">Why should I concentrate in Religion?</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="os-slider node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">In the religion program students study a range of human experiences that have produced much of the greatest literature of the world, inspired its art and philosophy and shaped its moral consciousness. As a small concentration at Harvard, the Study of Religion is an intimate community within the larger university. Religion students regularly interact with faculty members and graduate students who share their interests. Tutorials are small (frequently one-on-one) and tailored to student interests. Student satisfaction with our program is consistently very high.</div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-7 views-row-odd views-row-last">
    <article id="node-57536" class="node node-faq node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="toggle node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/do-people-who-concentrate-religion-also-practice-certain-religion-do-you-have-believe" rel="bookmark">Do people who concentrate in religion also practice a religion?</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="os-slider node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>Some of our students are religious and some are not. Those who are religious practice different faiths—Judaism, Islam, Christianity, Buddhism, Hinduism and others. There is no presumption that students in religion will believe in God or practice a certain faith.</p></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
    </div>
  
  
  
  
  
  
</div>									</div>
								
							</section><!--main content ends-->
											</div>
				</div>

				
								  <!--sidebar second region beg-->

      <h2 class="block-title">FAQs by Program</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1372193109' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div class="item-list"><ul><li class="term-graduate"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/faq-taxonomy/graduate"  class="" title="">Graduate <span class="count">(18)</span></a></li><li class="term-undergraduate"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/faq-taxonomy/undergraduate"  class="" title="">Undergraduate <span class="count">(7)</span></a></li></ul></div></div></div></div>
  </div></section><section id="block-boxes-os-faq-sv-list" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_sv_list_box"  module="boxes" delta="os_faq_sv_list"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">Recent FAQs</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-os_faq_sv_list' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div id='box-os_faq_sv_list-page' data-page='0' data-delta='os_faq_sv_list' class='os-sv-list os_sv_list_box sv-list-faq sv-list-view-title sv-list-layout-list sv-grid-3'><div class="item-list"><ul><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/what-latest-information-unionization-graduate-students-harvard"  target="_top">What is the latest information on the unionization of graduate students at Harvard?</a></li><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/can-i-teach-years-g5-and-g6-priority-student"  target="_top">Can I teach in years G5 and G6, as a priority student?</a></li><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/do-you-require-writing-sample"  target="_top">Is a writing sample required for applicants?</a></li><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/how-do-i-apply-phd-program-study-religion-harvard-university"  target="_top">How do I apply to the Ph.D. Program in the Study of Religion at Harvard University?</a></li><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/can-doctoral-students-defer-funding"  target="_top">Can doctoral students defer funding?</a></li><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/what-are-family-accommodations-graduate-students"  target="_top">What are "Family Accommodations" for graduate students?</a></li></ul></div></div><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq"  class="more-link">More</a></div></div></div>

					<div class="content-inner">
					  <div class="breadcrumb"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/" >HOME</a> <span>&#47;</span> <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq" >FAQ</a> <span>&#47;</span> </div>
						
													<section id="main-content">
								<a name="main-content"></a>
																									<header id="main-content-header">
																					<h1 id="page-title">
												How do I apply to the Ph.D. Program in the Study of Religion at Harvard University?											</h1>
																													</header>
																
																	<div id="content">
										<article id="node-916981" class="node node-faq article clearfix" role="article">
  
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>Please go to <a href="http://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/pages/apply-phd" target="_blank" title="">"Apply PhD"</a> and follow instructions on applying to the Graduate School of Arts and Sciences at Harvard University.</p></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-og-vocabulary field-type-entityreference field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">See also: <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq-taxonomy/graduate" >Graduate</a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
									</div>
								
							</section><!--main content ends-->
											</div>
				</div>

				
								  <!--sidebar second region beg-->
				  <div class="region region-sidebar-second sidebar"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><section id="block-boxes-1372193109" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_taxonomy_fbt"  module="boxes" delta="1372193109"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">FAQs by Program</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1372193109' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div class="item-list"><ul><li class="term-graduate"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/faq-taxonomy/graduate"  class="" title="">Graduate <span class="count">(18)</span></a></li><li class="term-undergraduate"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/faq-taxonomy/undergraduate"  class="" title="">Undergraduate <span class="count">(7)</span></a></li></ul></div></div></div></div>
  </div></section><section id="block-boxes-os-faq-sv-list" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_sv_list_box"  module="boxes" delta="os_faq_sv_list"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">Recent FAQs</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-os_faq_sv_list' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div id='box-os_faq_sv_list-page' data-page='0' data-delta='os_faq_sv_list' class='os-sv-list os_sv_list_box sv-list-faq sv-list-view-title sv-list-layout-list sv-grid-3'><div class="item-list"><ul><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/what-latest-information-unionization-graduate-students-harvard"  target="_top">What is the latest information on the unionization of graduate students at Harvard?</a></li><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/can-i-teach-years-g5-and-g6-priority-student"  target="_top">Can I teach in years G5 and G6, as a priority student?</a></li><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/do-you-require-writing-sample"  target="_top">Is a writing sample required for applicants?</a></li><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/how-do-i-apply-phd-program-study-religion-harvard-university"  target="_top">How do I apply to the Ph.D. Program in the Study of Religion at Harvard University?</a></li><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/can-doctoral-students-defer-funding"  target="_top">Can doctoral students defer funding?</a></li><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/what-are-family-accommodations-graduate-students"  target="_top">What are "Family Accommodations" for graduate students?</a></li></ul></div></div><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq"  class="more-link">More</a></div></div></div>
  </div></section></div></div>				  <!--sidebar second region end-->

<meta property="og:title" content="Is a Master&#039;s degree required for application?" />
<meta property="og:description" content="While a master&#039;s degree is not a requirement, it is a distinct advantage in the application process, and in fact, most students admitted to the Ph.D. program have already earned master&#039;s degrees. The background gained from one or two years of study beyond the undergraduate level allows a student to enter a doctoral program prepared to do the advanced work required for a Ph.D. Students with an undergraduate record of high quality and extensive academic preparation relevant to their statement of purpose may be admitted with only a B.A." />

		<div id="columns" class="clearfix">
			<div class="hg-container">
				<div id="content-column" role="main">
					<div class="content-inner">
					  <div class="breadcrumb"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/" >HOME</a> <span>&#47;</span> <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq" >FAQ</a> <span>&#47;</span> </div>
						
													<section id="main-content">
								<a name="main-content"></a>
																									<header id="main-content-header">
																					<h1 id="page-title">
												Is a Master's degree required for application?											</h1>
																													</header>
																
																	<div id="content">
										<article id="node-64161" class="node node-faq article clearfix" role="article">
  
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>While a master's degree is not a requirement, it is a distinct advantage in the application process, and in fact, most students admitted to the Ph.D. program have already earned master's degrees. The background gained from one or two years of study beyond the undergraduate level allows a student to enter a doctoral program prepared to do the advanced work required for a Ph.D. Students with an undergraduate record of <em>high quality</em> and <em>extensive academic preparation relevant to their statement of purpose</em> may be admitted with only a B.A.</p></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-og-vocabulary field-type-entityreference field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">See also: <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq-taxonomy/graduate" >Graduate</a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
									</div>
								
							</section><!--main content ends-->
											</div>
				</div>

				
								  <!--sidebar second region beg-->
				  <div class="region region-sidebar-second sidebar"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><section id="block-boxes-1372193109" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_taxonomy_fbt"  module="boxes" delta="1372193109"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">FAQs by Program</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1372193109' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div class="item-list"><ul><li class="term-graduate"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/faq-taxonomy/graduate"  class="" title="">Graduate <span class="count">(18)</span></a></li><li class="term-undergraduate"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/faq-taxonomy/undergraduate"  class="" title="">Undergraduate <span class="count">(7)</span></a></li></ul></div></div></div></div>
  </div></section><section id="block-boxes-os-faq-sv-list" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_sv_list_box"  module="boxes" delta="os_faq_sv_list"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">Recent FAQs</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-os_faq_sv_list' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div id='box-os_faq_sv_list-page' data-page='0' data-delta='os_faq_sv_list' class='os-sv-list os_sv_list_box sv-list-faq sv-list-view-title sv-list-layout-list sv-grid-3'><div class="item-list"><ul><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/what-latest-information-unionization-graduate-students-harvard"  target="_top">What is the latest information on the unionization of graduate students at Harvard?</a></li><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/can-i-teach-years-g5-and-g6-priority-student"  target="_top">Can I teach in years G5 and G6, as a priority student?</a></li><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/do-you-require-writing-sample"  target="_top">Is a writing sample required for applicants?</a></li><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/how-do-i-apply-phd-program-study-religion-harvard-university"  target="_top">How do I apply to the Ph.D. Program in the Study of Religion at Harvard University?</a></li><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/can-doctoral-students-defer-funding"  target="_top">Can doctoral students defer funding?</a></li><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/what-are-family-accommodations-graduate-students"  target="_top">What are "Family Accommodations" for graduate students?</a></li></ul></div></div><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq"  class="more-link">More</a></div></div></div>
  </div></section></div></div>				  <!--sidebar second region end-->
        
			</div>
		</div>
		<!--footer region beg-->
		<footer id="footer" class="clearfix" role="contentinfo">
		<!-- Three column 3x33 Gpanel -->
		
			<div class="at-panel gpanel panel-display footer clearfix">

  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1371845153' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div id="file-53886" class="file file-image file-image-png">

		<div id="columns" class="clearfix">
			<div class="hg-container">
				<div id="content-column" role="main">
					<div class="content-inner">
					  <div class="breadcrumb"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/" >HOME</a> <span>&#47;</span> <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq" >FAQ</a> <span>&#47;</span> </div>
						
													<section id="main-content">
								<a name="main-content"></a>
																									<header id="main-content-header">
																					<h1 id="page-title">
												What are "Family Accommodations" for graduate students?											</h1>
																													</header>
																
																	<div id="content">
										<article id="node-892841" class="node node-faq article clearfix" role="article">
  
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>The Graduate School of Arts and Sciences offers accommodations to students who are anticipating the birth or adoption of a child. You may review the policy here: <strong><a href="https://gsas.harvard.edu/student-life/harvard-resources/parental-accommodation-and-financial-support">https://gsas.harvard.edu/student-life/harvard-resources/parental-accommodation-and-financial-support</a></strong></p></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-og-vocabulary field-type-entityreference field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">See also: <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq-taxonomy/graduate" >Graduate</a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
									</div>
								
							</section><!--main content ends-->
											</div>
				</div>

				
								  <!--sidebar second region beg-->
				  <div class="region region-sidebar-second sidebar"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><section id="block-boxes-1372193109" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_taxonomy_fbt"  module="boxes" delta="1372193109"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">FAQs by Program</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1372193109' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div class="item-list"><ul><li class="term-graduate"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/faq-taxonomy/graduate"  class="" title="">Graduate <span class="count">(18)</span></a></li><li class="term-undergraduate"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/faq-taxonomy/undergraduate"  class="" title="">Undergraduate <span class="count">(7)</span></a></li></ul></div></div></div></div>
  </div></section><section id="block-boxes-os-faq-sv-list" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_sv_list_box"  module="boxes" delta="os_faq_sv_list"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">Recent FAQs</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-os_faq_sv_list' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div id='box-os_faq_sv_list-page' data-page='0' data-delta='os_faq_sv_list' class='os-sv-list os_sv_list_box sv-list-faq sv-list-view-title sv-list-layout-list sv-grid-3'><div class="item-list"><ul><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/what-latest-information-unionization-graduate-students-harvard"  target="_top">What is the latest information on the unionization of graduate students at Harvard?</a></li><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/can-i-teach-years-g5-and-g6-priority-student"  target="_top">Can I teach in years G5 and G6, as a priority student?</a></li><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/do-you-require-writing-sample"  target="_top">Is a writing sample required for applicants?</a></li><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/how-do-i-apply-phd-program-study-religion-harvard-university"  target="_top">How do I apply to the Ph.D. Program in the Study of Religion at Harvard University?</a></li><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/can-doctoral-students-defer-funding"  target="_top">Can doctoral students defer funding?</a></li><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/what-are-family-accommodations-graduate-students"  target="_top">What are "Family Accommodations" for graduate students?</a></li></ul></div></div><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq"  class="more-link">More</a></div></div></div>
  </div></section></div></div>				  <!--sidebar second region end-->
        
			</div>
		</div>

  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-site_info' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><h1><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/" >Committee on the Study of Religion</a></h1>

>Courses</a></li><li class="menu-2809 menu-path-node-63841   even  "><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/pages/links"  title="">Related Organizations</a></li><li class="menu-2339 menu-path-node-56811   odd   last "><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/pages/mailing-list"  title="">Mailing List</a></li></ul></li><li class="menu-17680 menu-path-node-881226   odd   last "><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/calendars"  title="">Calendar</a></li></ul>

  </nav></div>		  <!--main menu region end-->
		
    
		<div id="columns" class="clearfix">
			<div class="hg-container">
				<div id="content-column" role="main">
					<div class="content-inner">
					  <div class="breadcrumb"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/" >HOME</a> <span>&#47;</span> <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq" >FAQ</a> <span>&#47;</span> </div>
						
													<section id="main-content">
								<a name="main-content"></a>
																									<header id="main-content-header">
																					<h1 id="page-title">
												What is the average length of study for doctoral candidates?											</h1>
																													</header>
																
																	<div id="content">
										<article id="node-64191" class="node node-faq article clearfix" role="article">
  
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>Program guidelines stipulate that students should complete their degrees in seven years. Some students may complete their doctoral programs sooner. Various factors, such as language study or research abroad, will affect the length of a student's program.</p></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-og-vocabulary field-type-entityreference field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">See also: <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq-taxonomy/graduate" >Graduate</a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
									</div>
								
							</section><!--main content ends-->
											</div>
				</div>

				
								  <!--sidebar second region beg-->
				  <div class="region region-sidebar-second sidebar"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><section id="block-boxes-1372193109" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_taxonomy_fbt"  module="boxes" delta="1372193109"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">FAQs by Program</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1372193109' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div class="item-list"><ul><li class="term-graduate"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/faq-taxonomy/graduate"  class="" title="">Graduate <span class="count">(18)</span></a></li><li class="term-undergraduate"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/faq-taxonomy/undergraduate"  class="" title="">Undergraduate <span class="count">(7)</span></a></li></ul></div></div></div></div>
  </div></section><section id="block-boxes-os-faq-sv-list" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_sv_list_box"  module="boxes" delta="os_faq_sv_list"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">Recent FAQs</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-os_faq_sv_list' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div id='box-os_faq_sv_list-page' data-page='0' data-delta='os_faq_sv_list' class='os-sv-list os_sv_list_box sv-list-faq sv-list-view-title sv-list-layout-list sv-grid-3'><div class="item-list"><ul><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/what-latest-information-unionization-graduate-students-harvard"  target="_top">What is the latest information on the unionization of graduate students at Harvard?</a></li><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/can-i-teach-years-g5-and-g6-priority-student"  target="_top">Can I teach in years G5 and G6, as a priority student?</a></li><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/do-you-require-writing-sample"  target="_top">Is a writing sample required for applicants?</a></li><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/how-do-i-apply-phd-program-study-religion-harvard-university"  target="_top">How do I apply to the Ph.D. Program in the Study of Religion at Harvard University?</a></li><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/can-doctoral-students-defer-funding"  target="_top">Can doctoral students defer funding?</a></li><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/what-are-family-accommodations-graduate-students"  target="_top">What are "Family Accommodations" for graduate students?</a></li></ul></div></div><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq"  class="more-link">More</a></div></div></div>
  </div></section></div></div>				  <!--sidebar second region end-->
        
			</div>
		</div>

		  <div id="menu-bar" class="nav region-menu-bar clearfix"><nav id="block-os-primary-menu" class="block block-os no-title menu-wrapper menu-bar-wrapper clearfix"  module="os" delta="primary-menu">

href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/pages/hebrew-bibleold-testament"  title="">Hebrew Bible/Old Testament</a></li><li class="menu-3289 menu-path-node-61681   even  "><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/pages/islamic-studies"  title="">Islamic Studies</a></li><li class="menu-3290 menu-path-node-61691   even  "><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/pages/jewish-studies"  title="">Jewish Studies</a></li><li class="menu-3298 menu-path-node-61696   odd  "><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/pages/new-testament-and-early-christianity"  title="">New Testament and Early Christianity</a></li><li class="menu-3299 menu-path-node-61701   even  "><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/pages/philosophy-religion"  title="">Philosophy of Religion</a></li><li class="menu-3301 menu-path-node-61711   odd  "><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/pages/religion-gender-and-culture"  title="">Religion, Gender and Culture</a></li><li class="menu-3291 menu-path-node-61706   even  "><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/pages/religion-and-society"  title="">Religion and Society</a></li><li class="menu-3300 menu-path-node-61721   odd  "><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/pages/religions-late-antiquity-judaism-and-christianity"  title="">Religions of Late Antiquity: Judaism and Christianity</a></li><li class="menu-3292 menu-path-node-61716   even  "><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/pages/religions-americas"  title="">Religions of the Americas</a></li><li class="menu-3293 menu-path-node-61726   odd  "><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/pages/south-asian-religions"  title="">South Asian Religions</a></li><li class="menu-3294 menu-path-node-61731   even   last "><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/pages/theology"  title="">Theology</a></li></ul></li><li class="menu-2615 menu-path-people-taxonomy-term-12866   odd  "><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/taxonomy/term/12866" >People</a></li><li class="menu-2338 menuparent  menu-path-node-56666   even  "><a   </nav></div>		  <!--main menu region end-->
		
    
		<div id="columns" class="clearfix">
			<div class="hg-container">
				<div id="content-column" role="main">
					<div class="content-inner">
					  <div class="breadcrumb"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/" >HOME</a> <span>&#47;</span> <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq" >FAQ</a> <span>&#47;</span> </div>
						
													<section id="main-content">
								<a name="main-content"></a>
																									<header id="main-content-header">
																					<h1 id="page-title">
												What is the latest information on the unionization of graduate students at Harvard?											</h1>
																													</header>
																
																	<div id="content">
										<article id="node-1000166" class="node node-faq article clearfix" role="article">
  
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>
	To keep current on the unionization of graduate students at Harvard, please refer to <a href="https://provost.harvard.edu/studentvote" title="">the page managed by the Office of the Provost.</a> Please note that the provost also sends direct communications to graduate students, faculty, and other members of the Harvard community.
</p>
</div></div></div><div class="field field-name-og-vocabulary field-type-entityreference field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">See also: <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq-taxonomy/graduate" >Graduate</a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
									</div>
								
							</section><!--main content ends-->
											</div>
				</div>

				
								  <!--sidebar second region beg-->
				  <div class="region region-sidebar-second sidebar"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><section id="block-boxes-1372193109" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_taxonomy_fbt"  module="boxes" delta="1372193109"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">FAQs by Program</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1372193109' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div class="item-list"><ul><li class="term-graduate"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/faq-taxonomy/graduate"  class="" title="">Graduate <span class="count">(18)</span></a></li><li class="term-undergraduate"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/faq-taxonomy/undergraduate"  class="" title="">Undergraduate <span class="count">(7)</span></a></li></ul></div></div></div></div>
  </div></section><section id="block-boxes-os-faq-sv-list" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_sv_list_box"  module="boxes" delta="os_faq_sv_list"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">Recent FAQs</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-os_faq_sv_list' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div id='box-os_faq_sv_list-page' data-page='0' data-delta='os_faq_sv_list' class='os-sv-list os_sv_list_box sv-list-faq sv-list-view-title sv-list-layout-list sv-grid-3'><div class="item-list"><ul><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/what-latest-information-unionization-graduate-students-harvard"  target="_top">What is the latest information on the unionization of graduate students at Harvard?</a></li><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/can-i-teach-years-g5-and-g6-priority-student"  target="_top">Can I teach in years G5 and G6, as a priority student?</a></li><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/do-you-require-writing-sample"  target="_top">Is a writing sample required for applicants?</a></li><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/how-do-i-apply-phd-program-study-religion-harvard-university"  target="_top">How do I apply to the Ph.D. Program in the Study of Religion at Harvard University?</a></li><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/can-doctoral-students-defer-funding"  target="_top">Can doctoral students defer funding?</a></li><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/what-are-family-accommodations-graduate-students"  target="_top">What are "Family Accommodations" for graduate students?</a></li></ul></div></div><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq"  class="more-link">More</a></div></div></div>
  </div></section></div></div>				  <!--sidebar second region end-->
        
			</div>

		<div id="columns" class="clearfix">
			<div class="hg-container">
				<div id="content-column" role="main">
					<div class="content-inner">
					  <div class="breadcrumb"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/" >HOME</a> <span>&#47;</span> <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq" >FAQ</a> <span>&#47;</span> </div>
						
													<section id="main-content">
								<a name="main-content"></a>
																									<header id="main-content-header">
																					<h1 id="page-title">
												What is required for application to the Ph.D. program?											</h1>
																													</header>
																
																	<div id="content">
										<article id="node-64156" class="node node-faq article clearfix" role="article">
  
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p><strong>T</strong>he program is highly competitive – we can accept only 5-7% of applicants to the PhD. For that reason, we look for the most capable applicants, with excellent credentials in all areas.</p>
<ul><li>A <strong>writing sample</strong> of no more than 10 pages in length.</li>
<li><strong>Transcripts</strong> from all undergraduate and graduate programs attended.</li>
<li><strong>Recommendations</strong> from three faculty members who can speak to your academic capabilities.</li>
<li><strong>GRE's</strong>. The basic exams (verbal, analytical, and math), but not any specialty exams, are required. Be sure to find out the schedule of GRE testing in time to have scores sent to Harvard by December 15th. Exam scores can be no older than 5 years. Most of our accepted applicants score above the 90th percentile in the verbal portion and above the 75th percentile in the analytical.</li>
<li><strong>TOEFL</strong> scores are required for all non-native English speakers unless they have received an Bachelor's degree from a university or college in which English is the language of instruction. Applicants must receive a score of <strong>620</strong> or higher on the paper-based test or <strong>105</strong> or higher on the Internet-based test.</li>
<li><strong>Statement of Purpose</strong> (1,000 word or less); this should outline a proposed project that is interesting, clearly stated, and aligned with faculty strengths at Harvard.</li>
</ul><p><em>Please note that there is only one application period; there is no rolling admissions.</em></p>
<p>For detailed application requirements to the Ph.D. program in the Graduate School of Arts and Sciences at Harvard University, please visit this page: <a href="http://www.gsas.harvard.edu/prospective_students/application_instructions_and_information.php">http://www.gsas.harvard.edu/prospective_students/application_instructions_and_information.php</a></p></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-og-vocabulary field-type-entityreference field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">See also: <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq-taxonomy/graduate" >Graduate</a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
									</div>
								
							</section><!--main content ends-->
											</div>
				</div>

				
								  <!--sidebar second region beg-->
				  <div class="region region-sidebar-second sidebar"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><section id="block-boxes-1372193109" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_taxonomy_fbt"  module="boxes" delta="1372193109"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">FAQs by Program</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1372193109' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div class="item-list"><ul><li class="term-graduate"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/faq-taxonomy/graduate"  class="" title="">Graduate <span class="count">(18)</span></a></li><li class="term-undergraduate"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/faq-taxonomy/undergraduate"  class="" title="">Undergraduate <span class="count">(7)</span></a></li></ul></div></div></div></div>
  </div></section><section id="block-boxes-os-faq-sv-list" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_sv_list_box"  module="boxes" delta="os_faq_sv_list"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">Recent FAQs</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-os_faq_sv_list' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div id='box-os_faq_sv_list-page' data-page='0' data-delta='os_faq_sv_list' class='os-sv-list os_sv_list_box sv-list-faq sv-list-view-title sv-list-layout-list sv-grid-3'><div class="item-list"><ul><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/what-latest-information-unionization-graduate-students-harvard"  target="_top">What is the latest information on the unionization of graduate students at Harvard?</a></li><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/can-i-teach-years-g5-and-g6-priority-student"  target="_top">Can I teach in years G5 and G6, as a priority student?</a></li><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/do-you-require-writing-sample"  target="_top">Is a writing sample required for applicants?</a></li><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/how-do-i-apply-phd-program-study-religion-harvard-university"  target="_top">How do I apply to the Ph.D. Program in the Study of Religion at Harvard University?</a></li><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/can-doctoral-students-defer-funding"  target="_top">Can doctoral students defer funding?</a></li><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq/what-are-family-accommodations-graduate-students"  target="_top">What are "Family Accommodations" for graduate students?</a></li></ul></div></div><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/faq"  class="more-link">More</a></div></div></div>

<div id="page" class="container page os_pages-section-56666 header-main header-right content-top footer-left">
	<div id="page-wrapper">

		
					<!--header regions beg-->
			<header id="header" class="clearfix" role="banner">
			 <div id="header-container">
				 <div id="header-panels" class="at-panel gpanel panel-display three-col clearfix">
					  					  <div class="region region-header-second"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><div id="block-boxes-site-info" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_boxes_site_info no-title"  module="boxes" delta="site_info"><div class="block-inner clearfix">
