      <h2 class="block-title">Faculty by Research Area</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1374003877' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div class="item-list"><ul><li class="term-african-religions"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/east-asian-religions"  class="" title="">East Asian Religions <span class="count">(4)</span></a></li><li class="term-ethics"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/greco-roman-religions"  class="" title="">Greco-Roman Religions <span class="count">(2)</span></a></li><li class="term-hebrew-bible-old-testament"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/hebrew-bibleold-testament"  class="" title="">Hebrew Bible/Old Testament <span class="count">(4)</span></a></li><li class="term-history-of-christianity"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/history-christianity"  class="" title="">History of Christianity <span class="count">(18)</span></a></li><li class="term-islamic-studies"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/islamic-studies"  class="" title="">Islamic Studies <span class="count">(8)</span></a></li><li class="term-jewish-studies"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/jewish-studies"  class="" title="">Jewish Studies <span class="count">(5)</span></a></li><li class="term-new-testament-and-early-christianity"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/new-testament-and-early-christianity"  class="" title="">New Testament and Early Christianity <span class="count">(5)</span></a></li><li class="term-philosophy-of-religion"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/philosophy-religion"  class="" title="">Philosophy of Religion <span class="count">(5)</span></a></li><li class="term-religion-and-society"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/religion-and-society"  class="" title="">Religion and Society <span class="count">(9)</span></a></li><li class="term-religion-gender-and-culture"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/religion-gender-and-culture"  class="" title="">Religion, Gender and Culture <span class="count">(10)</span></a></li><li class="term-religions-of-late-antiquity-judaism-and-christianity"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/religions-late-antiquity-judaism-and-christianity"  class="" title="">Religions of Late Antiquity: Judaism and Christianity <span class="count">(6)</span></a></li><li class="term-religions-of-the-americas"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/religions-americas"  class="" title="">Religions of the Americas <span class="count">(14)</span></a></li><li class="term-south-asian-religions"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/south-asian-religions"  class="" title="">South Asian Religions <span class="count">(7)</span></a></li><li class="term-theology"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/theology"  class="active" title="">Theology <span class="count">(10)</span></a></li></ul></div></div></div></div>
  </div></section><section id="block-boxes-1377706640" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_taxonomy_fbt"  module="boxes" delta="1377706640"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">Doctoral Students by Research Area</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1377706640' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div class="item-list"><ul><li class="term-african-religions"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/african-religions"  class="" title="">African Religions <span class="count">(2)</span></a></li><li class="term-buddhist-studies"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/buddhist-studies"  class="" title="">Buddhist Studies <span class="term-new-testament-and-early-christianity"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/new-testament-and-early-christianity"  class="" title="">New Testament and Early Christianity <span class="count">(15)</span></a></li><li class="term-philosophy-of-religion"><a <span class="count">(9)</span></a></li></ul></div></div></div></div>
  </div></section></div></div>				  <!--sidebar second region end-->

  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-site_info' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><h1><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/" >Committee on the Study of Religion</a></h1>

		  <div id="menu-bar" class="nav region-menu-bar clearfix"><nav id="block-os-primary-menu" class="block block-os no-title menu-wrapper menu-bar-wrapper clearfix"  module="os" delta="primary-menu">  
  
  <ul class="nice-menu nice-menu-down nice-menu-primary-menu" id="nice-menu-primary-menu"><li class="menu-2336 menu-path-  first   odd  "><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/" href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/religions-late-antiquity-judaism-and-christianity"  class="" title="">Religions of Late Antiquity: Judaism and Christianity <span class="count">(6)</span></a></li><li class="term-religions-of-the-americas"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/religions-americas"  class="" title="">Religions of the Americas <span class="count">(14)</span></a></li><li class="term-south-asian-religions"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/south-asian-religions"  class="" title="">South Asian Religions <span class="count">(7)</span></a></li><li class="term-theology"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/theology"  class="active" title="">Theology <span class="count">(10)</span></a></li></ul></div></div></div></div>
  </div></section><section id="block-boxes-1377706640" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_taxonomy_fbt"  module="boxes" delta="1377706640"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">Doctoral Students by Research Area</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1377706640' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div class="item-list"><ul><li class="term-african-religions"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/african-religions"  class="" title="">African Religions <span class="count">(2)</span></a></li><li class="term-buddhist-studies"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/buddhist-studies"  class="" title="">Buddhist Studies <span class="count">(10)</span></a></li><li class="term-comparative-studies"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/comparative-studies"  class="" title="">Comparative Studies <span class="count">(10)</span></a></li><li class="term-east-asian-religions"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/east-asian-religions"  class="" title="">East Asian Religions <span class="count">(3)</span></a></li><li class="term-ethics"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/ethics"  class="" title="">Ethics <span class="count">(2)</span></a></li><li class="term-hebrew-bible-old-testament"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/hebrew-bibleold-testament"  class="" title="">Hebrew Bible/Old Testament <span class="count">(7)</span></a></li><li class="term-history-of-christianity"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/history-christianity"  class="" title="">History of Christianity <span class="count">(7)</span></a></li><li class="term-islamic-studies"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/islamic-studies"  class="" title="">Islamic Studies <span class="count">(12)</span></a></li><li class="term-new-testament-and-early-christianity"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/new-testament-and-early-christianity"  class="" title="">New Testament and Early Christianity <span class="count">(15)</span></a></li><li class="term-philosophy-of-religion"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/philosophy-religion"  class="" title="">Philosophy of Religion <span class="count">(7)</span></a></li><li class="term-religion-and-society"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/religion-and-society"  class="" title="">Religion and Society <span class="count">(10)</span></a></li><li class="term-religion-gender-and-culture"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/religion-gender-and-culture"  class="" title="">Religion, Gender and Culture <span class="count">(8)</span></a></li><li class="term-religions-of-the-americas"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/religions-americas"  class="" title="">Religions of the Americas <span class="count">(7)</span></a></li><li class="term-south-asian-religions"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/south-asian-religions"  class="" title="">South Asian Religions <span class="count">(2)</span></a></li><li class="term-theology"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/theology"  class="" title="">Theology <span class="count">(9)</span></a></li></ul></div></div></div></div>
  </div></section></div></div>				  <!--sidebar second region end-->
        
			</div>
		</div>

  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-site_info' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><h1><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/" >Committee on the Study of Religion</a></h1>

</div></div></div>
  </div></div><div id="block-boxes-1372101242" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_boxes_html no-title"  module="boxes" delta="1372101242"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1372101242' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><p><strong>Committee on the Study of Religion</strong><br />Barker Center, Cambridge, MA 02138<br />Telephone: (617) 495-5781<br /><a href="mailto:csrel@fas.harvard.edu">csrel@fas.harvard.edu</a></p></div></div></div>
  </div></div></div></div>															</div>

													<section id="main-content">
								<a name="main-content"></a>
																									<header id="main-content-header">
																					<h1 id="page-title">
												Islamic Studies											</h1>
																													</header>
																
																	<div id="content">
										<div  class="os-taxonomy-term depth-0"><div class="term-listing-heading"></div><article id="node-61576" class="node node-person node-teaser article with-person-photo modified-in-os_profiles_process_node clearfix" role="article">

      
    
    <div class="field field-name-field-person-photo field-type-imagefield-crop field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser">
    <div class="field-items">
            <div class="field-item even">
      <figure>
        <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/leila-ahmed" ><img class="image-style-profile-thumbnail" src="//static.hwpi.harvard.edu/files/styles/profile_thumbnail/public/religion/files/ahmed.jpg?m=1508253072&amp;itok=W-Pr2xaX" width="75" height="75" alt="Leila Ahmed" title="Leila Ahmed" /></a>              </figure>
      </div>
        </div>
</div>    
    <div class="person-teaser-wrapper">  
              <header class="node-header">
                      <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
              <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/leila-ahmed" rel="bookmark">Leila Ahmed</a>
            </h1>
                  </header>
        
      <div class="node-content">
        <div class="pic-bio clearfix"><div class="field field-name-field-professional-title field-type-text field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Victor S. Thomas Professor of Divinity</div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p> <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/leila-ahmed" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Leila Ahmed</span></a></p></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-website field-type-link-field field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="http://www.hds.harvard.edu"  title="Leila Ahmed&#039;s website">Harvard Divinity School</a><br /></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-address field-type-text-long field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Harvard Divinity School<br>45 Francis Avenue<br>Cambridge MA 02138<br><br>office hours:  see Harvard Divinity School</div></div></div>      </div>
    
          
          
          </div>
    
  </article>
<article id="node-61421" class="node node-person node-teaser article with-person-photo modified-in-os_profiles_process_node clearfix" role="article">

      
    
    <div class="field field-name-field-person-photo field-type-imagefield-crop field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser">
    <div class="field-items">
            <div class="field-item even">
      <figure>
        <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/baber-johansen" ><img class="image-style-profile-thumbnail" src="//static.hwpi.harvard.edu/files/styles/profile_thumbnail/public/religion/files/johansen1.jpg?m=1374509103&amp;itok=frafkPT2" width="75" height="75" alt="Baber Johansen" title="Baber Johansen" /></a>              </figure>
      </div>
        </div>
</div>    
    <div class="person-teaser-wrapper">  
              <header class="node-header">

      <h2 class="block-title">Filter by Role</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1372191016' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div class="item-list"><ul><li class="term-administrative-staff"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/profile-type/staff"  class="" title="Chair, DUS, ADUS, Program Director/s, Staff Assistant, etc.">Administrative Staff <span class="count">(7)</span></a></li><li class="term-undergraduate-advisors"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/profile-type/undergraduate-advisors"  class="" title="">Undergraduate Advisors <span class="count">(16)</span></a></li><li class="term-committee-members"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/profile-type/committee-members"  class="" title="">Committee Members <span class="count">(31)</span></a></li><li class="term-faculty"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/profile-type/faculty"  class="" title="">Faculty <span class="count">(65)</span></a></li><li class="term-faculty-emeriti"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/profile-type/faculty-emeriti"  class="" title="Faculty who hold a research appointment or may only be teaching one course per year. href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/religions-late-antiquity-judaism-and-christianity"  class="" title="">Religions of Late Antiquity: Judaism and Christianity <span class="count">(6)</span></a></li><li class="term-religions-of-the-americas"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/religions-americas"  class="" title="">Religions of the Americas <span class="count">(14)</span></a></li><li class="term-south-asian-religions"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/south-asian-religions"  class="" title="">South Asian Religions <span class="count">(7)</span></a></li><li class="term-theology"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/theology"  class="active" title="">Theology <span class="count">(10)</span></a></li></ul></div></div></div></div>
  </div></section><section id="block-boxes-1377706640" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_taxonomy_fbt"  module="boxes" delta="1377706640"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">Doctoral Students by Research Area</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1377706640' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div class="item-list"><ul><li class="term-african-religions"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/african-religions"  class="" title="">African Religions <span class="count">(2)</span></a></li><li class="term-buddhist-studies"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/buddhist-studies"  class="" title="">Buddhist Studies <span class="count">(10)</span></a></li><li class="term-comparative-studies"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/comparative-studies"  class="" title="">Comparative Studies <span class="count">(10)</span></a></li><li class="term-east-asian-religions"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/east-asian-religions"  class="" title="">East Asian Religions <span class="count">(3)</span></a></li><li class="term-ethics"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/ethics"  class="" title="">Ethics <span class="count">(2)</span></a></li><li class="term-hebrew-bible-old-testament"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/hebrew-bibleold-testament"  class="" title="">Hebrew Bible/Old Testament <span class="count">(7)</span></a></li><li class="term-history-of-christianity"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/history-christianity"  class="" title="">History of Christianity <span class="count">(7)</span></a></li><li class="term-islamic-studies"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/islamic-studies"  class="" title="">Islamic Studies <span class="count">(12)</span></a></li><li class="term-new-testament-and-early-christianity"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/new-testament-and-early-christianity"  class="" title="">New Testament and Early Christianity <span class="count">(15)</span></a></li><li class="term-philosophy-of-religion"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/philosophy-religion"  class="" title="">Philosophy of Religion <span class="count">(7)</span></a></li><li class="term-religion-and-society"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/religion-and-society"  class="" title="">Religion and Society <span class="count">(10)</span></a></li><li class="term-religion-gender-and-culture"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/religion-gender-and-culture"  class="" title="">Religion, Gender and Culture <span class="count">(8)</span></a></li><li class="term-religions-of-the-americas"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/religions-americas"  class="" title="">Religions of the Americas <span class="count">(7)</span></a></li><li class="term-south-asian-religions"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/south-asian-religions"  class="" title="">South Asian Religions <span class="count">(2)</span></a></li><li class="term-theology"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/theology"  class="" title="">Theology <span class="count">(9)</span></a></li></ul></div></div></div></div>
  </div></section></div></div>				  <!--sidebar second region end-->
        
			</div>
		</div>

  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-site_info' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><h1><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/" >Committee on the Study of Religion</a></h1>

  </div></section><section id="block-boxes-1377706640" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_taxonomy_fbt"  module="boxes" delta="1377706640"><div class="block-inner clearfix">

  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1377706640' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div class="item-list"><ul><li class="term-african-religions"><a class="" title="">Comparative Studies <span class="count">(10)</span></a></li><li class="term-east-asian-religions"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/east-asian-religions"  class="" title="">East Asian Religions <span class="count">(3)</span></a></li><li class="term-ethics"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/ethics"  class="" title="">Ethics <span class="count">(2)</span></a></li><li class="term-hebrew-bible-old-testament"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/hebrew-bibleold-testament"  class="" title="">Hebrew Bible/Old Testament <span class="count">(7)</span></a></li><li class="term-history-of-christianity"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/history-christianity"  class="" title="">History of Christianity <span class="count">(7)</span></a></li><li class="term-islamic-studies"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/islamic-studies"  class="" title="">Islamic Studies <span class="count">(12)</span></a></li><li class="term-new-testament-and-early-christianity"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/new-testament-and-early-christianity"  class="" title="">New Testament and Early Christianity <span class="count">(15)</span></a></li><li class="term-philosophy-of-religion"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/philosophy-religion"  class="" title="">Philosophy of Religion <span class="count">(7)</span></a></li><li class="term-religion-and-society"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/religion-and-society"  class="" title="">Religion and Society <span class="count">(10)</span></a></li><li class="term-religion-gender-and-culture"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/religion-gender-and-culture"  class="" title="">Religion, Gender and Culture <span class="count">(8)</span></a></li><li class="term-religions-of-the-americas"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/religions-americas"  class="" title="">Religions of the Americas <span class="count">(7)</span></a></li><li class="term-south-asian-religions"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/south-asian-religions"  class="" title="">South Asian Religions <span class="count">(2)</span></a></li><li class="term-theology"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/theology"  class="" title="">Theology <span class="count">(9)</span></a></li></ul></div></div></div></div>
  </div></section></div></div>				  <!--sidebar second region end-->
        
			</div>
		</div>
		<!--footer region beg-->
		<footer id="footer" class="clearfix" role="contentinfo">

  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-site_info' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><h1><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/" >Committee on the Study of Religion</a></h1>

  </nav></div>		  <!--main menu region end-->
		
    
		<div id="columns" class="clearfix">
			<div class="hg-container">
				<div id="content-column" role="main">
					<div class="content-inner">

  </div></section><section id="block-boxes-1377706640" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_taxonomy_fbt"  module="boxes" delta="1377706640"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">Doctoral Students by Research Area</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1377706640' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div class="item-list"><ul><li class="term-african-religions"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/south-asian-religions"  class="" title="">South Asian Religions <span class="count">(2)</span></a></li><li class="term-theology"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/theology"  class="" title="">Theology <span class="count">(9)</span></a></li></ul></div></div></div></div>
  </div></section></div></div>				  <!--sidebar second region end-->
        
			</div>
		</div>
		<!--footer region beg-->
		<footer id="footer" class="clearfix" role="contentinfo">
		<!-- Three column 3x33 Gpanel -->

  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1371845153' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div id="file-53886" class="file file-image file-image-png">

          <h2 class="element-invisible"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/files/religion/files/religion-footer.png?m=1479879567">religion-footer.png</a></h2>

		<div id="columns" class="clearfix">
			<div class="hg-container">
				<div id="content-column" role="main">
					<div class="content-inner">
					  <div class="breadcrumb"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/" >HOME</a> <span>&#47;</span> </div>
						
													<section id="main-content">
								<a name="main-content"></a>
																									<header id="main-content-header">
																					<h1 id="page-title">
												Philosophy of Religion											</h1>
																													</header>
																
																	<div id="content">
										<div  class="os-taxonomy-term depth-0"><div class="term-listing-heading"></div><article id="node-1059401" class="node node-person node-teaser article with-person-photo modified-in-os_profiles_process_node clearfix" role="article">

      
    
    <div class="field field-name-field-person-photo field-type-imagefield-crop field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser">
    <div class="field-items">
            <div class="field-item even">
      <figure>
        <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/james-engell" ><img class="image-style-profile-thumbnail" src="//static.hwpi.harvard.edu/files/styles/profile_thumbnail/public/religion/files/engell.png?m=1505406604&amp;itok=WYqmri12" width="75" height="75" alt="James Engell" title="James Engell" /></a>              </figure>
      </div>
        </div>
</div>    
    <div class="person-teaser-wrapper">  
              <header class="node-header">
                      <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
              <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/james-engell" rel="bookmark">James Engell</a>
            </h1>
                  </header>
        
      <div class="node-content">
        <div class="pic-bio clearfix"><div class="field field-name-field-professional-title field-type-text field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Gurney Professor of English Literature and Professor of Comparative Literature</div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>&#13;
	<strong>James Engell</strong> is Gurney Professor of English and Professor of Comparative Literature, also a member of the Committee on Degrees in</p> <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/james-engell" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about James Engell</span></a></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-address field-type-text-long field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Barker Center 272</div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-office-hours field-type-text field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Tuesdays and Thursdays 2:45-3:45 and by appointment. Hours may change during Reading and Examination Period.</div></div></div>      </div>
    
          
          
          </div>
    
  </article>

													<section id="main-content">
								<a name="main-content"></a>
																									<header id="main-content-header">
																					<h1 id="page-title">
												Religion and Society											</h1>
																													</header>
																
																	<div id="content">
										<div  class="os-taxonomy-term depth-0"><div class="term-listing-heading"></div><article id="node-75751" class="node node-person node-teaser article with-person-photo modified-in-os_profiles_process_node clearfix" role="article">

      
    
    <div class="field field-name-field-person-photo field-type-imagefield-crop field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser">
    <div class="field-items">
            <div class="field-item even">
      <figure>
        <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/matthew-l-potts" ><img class="image-style-profile-thumbnail" src="//static.hwpi.harvard.edu/files/styles/profile_thumbnail/public/religion/files/potts-news.jpg?m=1381245265&amp;itok=B41sshme" width="75" height="75" alt="Matthew L. Potts" title="Matthew L. Potts" /></a>              </figure>
      </div>
        </div>
</div>    
    <div class="person-teaser-wrapper">  
              <header class="node-header">
                      <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
              <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/matthew-l-potts" rel="bookmark">Matthew L. Potts</a>
            </h1>
                  </header>
        
      <div class="node-content">
        <div class="pic-bio clearfix"><div class="field field-name-field-professional-title field-type-text field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Assistant Professor of Ministry Studies</div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p> <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/matthew-l-potts" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Matthew L. Potts</span></a></p></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-website field-type-link-field field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="http://www.hds.harvard.edu"  title="Matthew L. Potts&#039;s website">Harvard Divinity School</a><br /></div></div></div></div>      </div>
    
          
          
          </div>
    
  </article>
<article id="node-61506" class="node node-person node-teaser article with-person-photo modified-in-os_profiles_process_node clearfix" role="article">

      
    
    <div class="field field-name-field-person-photo field-type-imagefield-crop field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser">
    <div class="field-items">
            <div class="field-item even">
      <figure>
        <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/francis-sc%C3%BCssler-fiorenza" ><img class="image-style-profile-thumbnail" src="//static.hwpi.harvard.edu/files/styles/profile_thumbnail/public/religion/files/fiorenza1.jpg?m=1505406682&amp;itok=ZPjYdUUu" width="75" height="75" alt="Francis Schüssler Fiorenza" title="Francis Schüssler Fiorenza" /></a>              </figure>
      </div>
        </div>
</div>    
    <div class="person-teaser-wrapper">  
              <header class="node-header">
                      <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
              <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/francis-sc%C3%BCssler-fiorenza" rel="bookmark">Francis Schüssler Fiorenza</a>
            </h1>
                  </header>
        
      <div class="node-content">
        <div class="pic-bio clearfix"><div class="field field-name-field-professional-title field-type-text field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Charles Chauncey Stillman Professor of Roman Catholic Theological Studies</div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>

      <h2 class="block-title">Filter by Role</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1372191016' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div class="item-list"><ul><li class="term-administrative-staff"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/profile-type/staff"  class="" title="Chair, DUS, ADUS, Program Director/s, Staff Assistant, etc.">Administrative Staff <span class="count">(7)</span></a></li><li class="term-undergraduate-advisors"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/profile-type/undergraduate-advisors"  class="" title="">Undergraduate Advisors <span class="count">(16)</span></a></li><li class="term-committee-members"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/profile-type/committee-members"  class="" title="">Committee Members <span class="count">(31)</span></a></li><li class="term-faculty"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/profile-type/faculty"  class="" title="">Faculty <span class="count">(65)</span></a></li><li class="term-faculty-emeriti"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/profile-type/faculty-emeriti"  class="" title="Faculty who hold a research appointment or may only be teaching one course per year. These faculty members are not taking on doctoral students.">Faculty Emeriti <span class="count">(6)</span></a></li><li class="term-doctoral-students-phd"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/profile-type/doctoral-students"  class="" title="">Doctoral Students (PhD) <span class="count">(84)</span></a></li><li class="term-doctoral-students-thd"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/profile-type/doctoral-students-thd"  class="" title="">Doctoral Students (ThD) <span class="count">(24)</span></a></li><li class="term-alumni"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/profile-type/alumni"  class="" title="">Alumni <span class="count">(16)</span></a></li></ul></div></div></div></div>
  </div></section><section id="block-boxes-1374158242" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_boxes_html"  module="boxes" delta="1374158242"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">Harvard University Directory</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1374158242' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><p>

      <h2 class="block-title">Faculty by Research Area</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1374003877' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div class="item-list"><ul><li class="term-african-religions"><a class="term-hebrew-bible-old-testament"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/hebrew-bibleold-testament"  class="" title="">Hebrew Bible/Old Testament <span class="count">(4)</span></a></li><li class="term-history-of-christianity"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/history-christianity"  class="" title="">History of Christianity <span class="count">(18)</span></a></li><li class="term-islamic-studies"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/islamic-studies"  class="" title="">Islamic Studies <span class="count">(8)</span></a></li><li class="term-jewish-studies"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/jewish-studies"  class="" title="">Jewish Studies <span class="count">(5)</span></a></li><li class="term-new-testament-and-early-christianity"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/new-testament-and-early-christianity"  class="" title="">New Testament and Early Christianity <span class="count">(5)</span></a></li><li class="term-philosophy-of-religion"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/philosophy-religion"  class="" title="">Philosophy of Religion <span class="count">(5)</span></a></li><li class="term-religion-and-society"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/religion-and-society"  class="" title="">Religion and Society <span class="count">(9)</span></a></li><li class="term-religion-gender-and-culture"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/religion-gender-and-culture"  class="" title="">Religion, Gender and Culture <span class="count">(10)</span></a></li><li class="term-religions-of-late-antiquity-judaism-and-christianity"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/religions-late-antiquity-judaism-and-christianity"  class="" title="">Religions of Late Antiquity: Judaism and Christianity <span class="count">(6)</span></a></li><li class="term-religions-of-the-americas"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/religions-americas"  class="" title="">Religions of the Americas <span class="count">(14)</span></a></li><li class="term-south-asian-religions"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/south-asian-religions"  class="" title="">South Asian Religions <span class="count">(7)</span></a></li><li class="term-theology"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/theology"  class="active" title="">Theology <span class="count">(10)</span></a></li></ul></div></div></div></div>
  </div></section><section id="block-boxes-1377706640" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_taxonomy_fbt"  module="boxes" delta="1377706640"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">Doctoral Students by Research Area</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1377706640' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div class="item-list"><ul><li class="term-african-religions"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/african-religions"  class="" title="">African Religions <span class="count">(2)</span></a></li><li class="term-buddhist-studies"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/buddhist-studies"  class="" title="">Buddhist Studies <span class="count">(10)</span></a></li><li class="term-comparative-studies"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/comparative-studies"  class="" title="">Comparative Studies <span class="count">(10)</span></a></li><li class="term-east-asian-religions"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/east-asian-religions"  class="" title="">East Asian Religions <span class="count">(3)</span></a></li><li class="term-ethics"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/ethics"  class="" title="">Ethics <span class="count">(2)</span></a></li><li class="term-hebrew-bible-old-testament"><a class="count">(7)</span></a></li><li class="term-history-of-christianity"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/history-christianity" href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/islamic-studies"  class="" title="">Islamic Studies <span class="count">(12)</span></a></li><li class="term-new-testament-and-early-christianity"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/new-testament-and-early-christianity"  class="" title="">New Testament and Early Christianity <span class="count">(15)</span></a></li><li class="term-philosophy-of-religion"><a class="count">(7)</span></a></li><li class="term-religion-and-society"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/religion-and-society" class="count">(8)</span></a></li><li class="term-religions-of-the-americas"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/religions-americas" href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/south-asian-religions"  class="" title="">South Asian Religions <span class="count">(2)</span></a></li><li class="term-theology"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/research-areas-duplicated-doctoral-students/theology"  class="" title="">Theology <span class="count">(9)</span></a></li></ul></div></div></div></div>
  </div></section></div></div>				  <!--sidebar second region end-->
        
			</div>
		</div>

  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-site_info' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><h1><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/" >Committee on the Study of Religion</a></h1>

		  <div id="menu-bar" class="nav region-menu-bar clearfix"><nav id="block-os-primary-menu" class="block block-os no-title menu-wrapper menu-bar-wrapper clearfix"  module="os" delta="primary-menu">  
  
  <ul class="nice-menu nice-menu-down nice-menu-primary-menu" id="nice-menu-primary-menu"><li class="menu-2336 menu-path-  first   odd  "><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/" 		<div id="columns" class="clearfix">

            <div class="field-item even">
      <figure>
        <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/elisabeth-sch%C3%BCssler-fiorenza" ><img class="image-style-profile-thumbnail" src="//static.hwpi.harvard.edu/files/styles/profile_thumbnail/public/religion/files/esf1.jpeg?m=1374508130&amp;itok=1Qp3b2qw" width="75" height="75" alt="Elisabeth Schüssler Fiorenza" title="Elisabeth Schüssler Fiorenza" /></a>              </figure>
      </div>
        </div>
</div>    
    <div class="person-teaser-wrapper">  
              <header class="node-header">
                      <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
              <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/elisabeth-sch%C3%BCssler-fiorenza" rel="bookmark">Elisabeth Schüssler Fiorenza</a>
            </h1>
                  </header>
        
      <div class="node-content">
        <div class="pic-bio clearfix"><div class="field field-name-field-professional-title field-type-text field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Krister Stendahl Professor of Divinity</div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p> <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/elisabeth-sch%C3%BCssler-fiorenza" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Elisabeth Schüssler Fiorenza</span></a></p></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-website field-type-link-field field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="http://www.hds.harvard.edu"  title="Elisabeth Schüssler Fiorenza&#039;s website">Harvard Divinity School</a><br /></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-address field-type-text-long field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Harvard Divinity School<br>45 Francis Avenue<br>Cambridge MA 02138<br><br>office hours: see Harvard Divinity School</div></div></div>      </div>
    
          
          
          </div>
    
  </article>
<article id="node-60876" class="node node-person node-teaser article with-person-photo modified-in-os_profiles_process_node clearfix" role="article">

      
    
    <div class="field field-name-field-person-photo field-type-imagefield-crop field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser">
    <div class="field-items">
            <div class="field-item even">
      <figure>
        <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/janet-gyatso" ><img class="image-style-profile-thumbnail" src="//static.hwpi.harvard.edu/files/styles/profile_thumbnail/public/religion/files/gyatso1.jpg?m=1374508954&amp;itok=y7IekEb2" width="75" height="75" alt="Janet Gyatso" title="Janet Gyatso" /></a>              </figure>
      </div>
        </div>
</div>    
    <div class="person-teaser-wrapper">  
              <header class="node-header">
                      <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
              <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/janet-gyatso" rel="bookmark">Janet Gyatso</a>
            </h1>
                  </header>
        
      <div class="node-content">
        <div class="pic-bio clearfix"><div class="field field-name-field-professional-title field-type-text field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Hershey Professor of Buddhist Studies</div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p> <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/janet-gyatso" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Janet Gyatso</span></a></p></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-website field-type-link-field field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="http://www.hds.harvard.edu"  title="Janet Gyatso&#039;s website">Harvard Divinity School</a><br /></div><div class="field-item odd"><a href="http://harvardealc.org/home.html"  title="Janet Gyatso&#039;s website">East Asian Languages and Civilizations</a><br /></div><div class="field-item even"><a href="http://iaas.fas.harvard.edu/"  title="Janet Gyatso&#039;s website">Committee on Inner Asia and Altaic Studies</a><br /></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-address field-type-text-long field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Harvard Divinity School<br>45 Francis Avenue<br>Cambridge MA 02138<br><br>office hours: see Harvard Divinity School</div></div></div>      </div>

  </article>

      <h2 class="block-title">Filter by Role</h2>

										<div  class="os-taxonomy-term depth-0"><div class="term-listing-heading"></div><article id="node-1059401" class="node node-person node-teaser article with-person-photo modified-in-os_profiles_process_node clearfix" role="article">

      
    
    <div class="field field-name-field-person-photo field-type-imagefield-crop field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser">
    <div class="field-items">
            <div class="field-item even">
      <figure>
        <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/james-engell" ><img class="image-style-profile-thumbnail" src="//static.hwpi.harvard.edu/files/styles/profile_thumbnail/public/religion/files/engell.png?m=1505406604&amp;itok=WYqmri12" width="75" height="75" alt="James Engell" title="James Engell" /></a>              </figure>
      </div>
        </div>
</div>    
    <div class="person-teaser-wrapper">  
              <header class="node-header">
                      <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
              <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/james-engell" rel="bookmark">James Engell</a>
            </h1>
                  </header>
        
      <div class="node-content">
        <div class="pic-bio clearfix"><div class="field field-name-field-professional-title field-type-text field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Gurney Professor of English Literature and Professor of Comparative Literature</div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>&#13;
	<strong>James Engell</strong> is Gurney Professor of English and Professor of Comparative Literature, also a member of the Committee on Degrees in</p> <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/james-engell" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about James Engell</span></a></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-address field-type-text-long field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Barker Center 272</div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-office-hours field-type-text field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Tuesdays and Thursdays 2:45-3:45 and by appointment. Hours may change during Reading and Examination Period.</div></div></div>      </div>
    
          
          
          </div>
    
  </article>

      <div class="node-content">

								  <!--sidebar second region beg-->
				  <div class="region region-sidebar-second sidebar"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><section id="block-boxes-1372191016" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_taxonomy_fbt"  module="boxes" delta="1372191016"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">Filter by Role</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1372191016' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div class="item-list"><ul><li class="term-administrative-staff"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/profile-type/staff"  class="" title="Chair, DUS, ADUS, Program Director/s, Staff Assistant, etc.">Administrative Staff <span class="count">(7)</span></a></li><li class="term-undergraduate-advisors"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/profile-type/undergraduate-advisors"  class="" title="">Undergraduate Advisors <span class="count">(16)</span></a></li><li class="term-committee-members"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/profile-type/committee-members"  class="" title="">Committee Members <span class="count">(31)</span></a></li><li class="term-faculty"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/profile-type/faculty"  class="" title="">Faculty <span class="count">(65)</span></a></li><li class="term-faculty-emeriti"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/profile-type/faculty-emeriti"  class="" title="Faculty who hold a research appointment or may only be teaching one course per year. These faculty members are not taking on doctoral students.">Faculty Emeriti <span class="count">(6)</span></a></li><li class="term-doctoral-students-phd"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/profile-type/doctoral-students"  class="" title="">Doctoral Students (PhD) <span class="count">(84)</span></a></li><li class="term-doctoral-students-thd"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/profile-type/doctoral-students-thd"  class="" title="">Doctoral Students (ThD) <span class="count">(24)</span></a></li><li class="term-alumni"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/profile-type/alumni"  class="" title="">Alumni <span class="count">(16)</span></a></li></ul></div></div></div></div>
  </div></section><section id="block-boxes-1374158242" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_boxes_html"  module="boxes" delta="1374158242"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">Harvard University Directory</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1374158242' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><p>
	<a href="https://www.directory.harvard.edu/" title="">Harvard Public Directory</a>
</p>

<p>
	<span style="color:#000000">Please refer to the public directory for the most up-to-date contact information.</span>
</p>
</div></div></div>
  </div></section><section id="block-boxes-1374003877" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_taxonomy_fbt"  module="boxes" delta="1374003877"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">Faculty by Research Area</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1374003877' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div class="item-list"><ul><li class="term-african-religions"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/african-religions"  class="" title="">African Religions <span class="count">(5)</span></a></li><li class="term-buddhist-studies"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/buddhist-studies"  class="" title="">Buddhist Studies <span class="count">(6)</span></a></li><li class="term-comparative-studies"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/comparative-studies"  class="" title="">Comparative Studies <span class="count">(9)</span></a></li><li class="term-east-asian-religions"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/east-asian-religions"  class="" title="">East Asian Religions <span class="count">(4)</span></a></li><li class="term-ethics"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/ethics"  class="" title="">Ethics <span class="count">(5)</span></a></li><li class="term-greco-roman-religions"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/greco-roman-religions"  class="" title="">Greco-Roman Religions <span class="count">(2)</span></a></li><li class="term-hebrew-bible-old-testament"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/hebrew-bibleold-testament"  class="" title="">Hebrew Bible/Old Testament <span class="count">(4)</span></a></li><li class="term-history-of-christianity"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/history-christianity"  class="" title="">History of Christianity <span class="count">(18)</span></a></li><li class="term-islamic-studies"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/islamic-studies"  class="" title="">Islamic Studies <span class="count">(8)</span></a></li><li class="term-jewish-studies"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/jewish-studies"  class="" title="">Jewish Studies <span class="count">(5)</span></a></li><li class="term-new-testament-and-early-christianity"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/new-testament-and-early-christianity"  class="" title="">New Testament and Early Christianity <span class="count">(5)</span></a></li><li class="term-philosophy-of-religion"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/philosophy-religion"  class="" title="">Philosophy of Religion <span class="count">(5)</span></a></li><li class="term-religion-and-society"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/religion-and-society"  class="" title="">Religion and Society <span class="count">(9)</span></a></li><li class="term-religion-gender-and-culture"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/religion-gender-and-culture"  class="" title="">Religion, Gender and Culture <span class="count">(10)</span></a></li><li class="term-religions-of-late-antiquity-judaism-and-christianity"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/religions-late-antiquity-judaism-and-christianity"  class="" title="">Religions of Late Antiquity: Judaism and Christianity <span class="count">(6)</span></a></li><li class="term-religions-of-the-americas"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/religions-americas"  class="" title="">Religions of the Americas <span class="count">(14)</span></a></li><li class="term-south-asian-religions"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/south-asian-religions"  class="" title="">South Asian Religions <span class="count">(7)</span></a></li><li class="term-theology"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/theology"  class="active" title="">Theology <span class="count">(10)</span></a></li></ul></div></div></div></div>
  </div></section><section id="block-boxes-1377706640" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_taxonomy_fbt"  module="boxes" delta="1377706640"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">Doctoral Students by Research Area</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1377706640' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div class="item-list"><ul><li class="term-african-religions"><a 	<div id="page-wrapper">

		
					<!--header regions beg-->
			<header id="header" class="clearfix" role="banner">
			 <div id="header-container">

				  <div class="region region-sidebar-second sidebar"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><section id="block-boxes-1372191016" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_taxonomy_fbt"  module="boxes" delta="1372191016"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">Filter by Role</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1372191016' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div class="item-list"><ul><li class="term-administrative-staff"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/profile-type/staff"  class="" title="Chair, DUS, ADUS, Program Director/s, Staff Assistant, etc.">Administrative Staff <span class="count">(7)</span></a></li><li class="term-undergraduate-advisors"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/profile-type/undergraduate-advisors"  class="" title="">Undergraduate Advisors <span class="count">(16)</span></a></li><li class="term-committee-members"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/profile-type/committee-members"  class="" title="">Committee Members <span class="count">(31)</span></a></li><li class="term-faculty"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/profile-type/faculty"  class="" title="">Faculty <span class="count">(65)</span></a></li><li class="term-faculty-emeriti"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/profile-type/faculty-emeriti"  class="" title="Faculty who hold a research appointment or may only be teaching one course per year. These faculty members are not taking on doctoral students.">Faculty Emeriti <span class="count">(6)</span></a></li><li class="term-doctoral-students-phd"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/profile-type/doctoral-students"  class="" title="">Doctoral Students (PhD) <span class="count">(84)</span></a></li><li class="term-doctoral-students-thd"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/profile-type/doctoral-students-thd"  class="" title="">Doctoral Students (ThD) <span class="count">(24)</span></a></li><li class="term-alumni"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/profile-type/alumni"  class="" title="">Alumni <span class="count">(16)</span></a></li></ul></div></div></div></div>
  </div></section><section id="block-boxes-1374158242" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_boxes_html"  module="boxes" delta="1374158242"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">Harvard University Directory</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1374158242' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><p>
	<a href="https://www.directory.harvard.edu/" title="">Harvard Public Directory</a>
</p>

<p>
	<span style="color:#000000">Please refer to the public directory for the most up-to-date contact information.</span>
</p>
</div></div></div>
  </div></section><section id="block-boxes-1374003877" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_taxonomy_fbt"  module="boxes" delta="1374003877"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">Faculty by Research Area</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1374003877' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div class="item-list"><ul><li class="term-african-religions"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/african-religions"  class="" title="">African Religions <span class="count">(5)</span></a></li><li class="term-buddhist-studies"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/buddhist-studies"  class="" title="">Buddhist Studies <span class="count">(6)</span></a></li><li class="term-comparative-studies"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/comparative-studies"  class="" title="">Comparative Studies <span class="count">(9)</span></a></li><li class="term-east-asian-religions"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/east-asian-religions"  class="" title="">East Asian Religions <span class="count">(4)</span></a></li><li class="term-ethics"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/ethics"  class="" title="">Ethics <span class="count">(5)</span></a></li><li class="term-greco-roman-religions"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/greco-roman-religions"  class="" title="">Greco-Roman Religions <span class="count">(2)</span></a></li><li class="term-hebrew-bible-old-testament"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/hebrew-bibleold-testament"  class="" title="">Hebrew Bible/Old Testament <span class="count">(4)</span></a></li><li class="term-history-of-christianity"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/history-christianity"  class="" title="">History of Christianity <span class="count">(18)</span></a></li><li class="term-islamic-studies"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/islamic-studies"  class="" title="">Islamic Studies <span class="count">(8)</span></a></li><li class="term-jewish-studies"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/jewish-studies"  class="" title="">Jewish Studies <span class="count">(5)</span></a></li><li class="term-new-testament-and-early-christianity"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/new-testament-and-early-christianity"  class="" title="">New Testament and Early Christianity <span class="count">(5)</span></a></li><li class="term-philosophy-of-religion"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/philosophy-religion"  class="" title="">Philosophy of Religion <span class="count">(5)</span></a></li><li class="term-religion-and-society"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/religion-and-society"  class="" title="">Religion and Society <span class="count">(9)</span></a></li><li class="term-religion-gender-and-culture"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/religion-gender-and-culture"  class="" title="">Religion, Gender and Culture <span class="count">(10)</span></a></li><li class="term-religions-of-late-antiquity-judaism-and-christianity"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/religions-late-antiquity-judaism-and-christianity"  class="" title="">Religions of Late Antiquity: Judaism and Christianity <span class="count">(6)</span></a></li><li class="term-religions-of-the-americas"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/religions-americas"  class="" title="">Religions of the Americas <span class="count">(14)</span></a></li><li class="term-south-asian-religions"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/south-asian-religions"  class="" title="">South Asian Religions <span class="count">(7)</span></a></li><li class="term-theology"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/research-area/theology"  class="active" title="">Theology <span class="count">(10)</span></a></li></ul></div></div></div></div>
  </div></section><section id="block-boxes-1377706640" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_taxonomy_fbt"  module="boxes" delta="1377706640"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">Doctoral Students by Research Area</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1377706640' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div class="item-list"><ul><li class="term-african-religions"><a   </div></section></div></div>				  <!--sidebar second region end-->

	<div id="page-wrapper">

		
					<!--header regions beg-->
			<header id="header" class="clearfix" role="banner">
			 <div id="header-container">
				 <div id="header-panels" class="at-panel gpanel panel-display three-col clearfix">
					  					  <div class="region region-header-second"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><div id="block-boxes-site-info" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_boxes_site_info no-title"  module="boxes" delta="site_info"><div class="block-inner clearfix">

    <div class="person-teaser-wrapper">  
              <header class="node-header">
                      <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
              <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/janet-gyatso" rel="bookmark">Janet Gyatso</a>
            </h1>
                  </header>
        
      <div class="node-content">
        <div class="pic-bio clearfix"><div class="field field-name-field-professional-title field-type-text field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Hershey Professor of Buddhist Studies</div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p> <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/janet-gyatso" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Janet Gyatso</span></a></p></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-website field-type-link-field field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="http://www.hds.harvard.edu"  title="Janet Gyatso&#039;s website">Harvard Divinity School</a><br /></div><div class="field-item odd"><a href="http://harvardealc.org/home.html"  title="Janet Gyatso&#039;s website">East Asian Languages and Civilizations</a><br /></div><div class="field-item even"><a href="http://iaas.fas.harvard.edu/"  title="Janet Gyatso&#039;s website">Committee on Inner Asia and Altaic Studies</a><br /></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-address field-type-text-long field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Harvard Divinity School<br>45 Francis Avenue<br>Cambridge MA 02138<br><br>office hours: see Harvard Divinity School</div></div></div>      </div>
    
          
          
          </div>
    
  </article>
<article id="node-60751" class="node node-person node-teaser article with-person-photo modified-in-os_profiles_process_node clearfix" role="article">

      
    
    <div class="field field-name-field-person-photo field-type-imagefield-crop field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser">
    <div class="field-items">
            <div class="field-item even">

    <div class="person-teaser-wrapper">  
              <header class="node-header">
                      <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
              <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/parimal-g-patil" rel="bookmark">Parimal G. Patil</a>
            </h1>
                  </header>
        
      <div class="node-content">
        <div class="pic-bio clearfix"><div class="field field-name-field-professional-title field-type-text field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Professor of Religion and Indian Philosophy<br />Chair of the Department of South Asian Studies</div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p> <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/parimal-g-patil" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Parimal G. Patil</span></a></p></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-website field-type-link-field field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="http://sas.fas.harvard.edu/icb/icb.do?keyword=k80097"  title="Parimal G. Patil&#039;s website">South Asian Studies</a><br /></div><div class="field-item odd"><a href="http://www.studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu"  title="Parimal G. Patil&#039;s website">The Committee on the Study of Religion</a><br /></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-address field-type-text-long field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Harvard University<br>The Study of Religion<br>Barker Center, 12 Quincy Street<br>Cambridge, MA 02138<br><br>office hours: contact professor directly</div></div></div>      </div>

      <h2 class="block-title">Filter by Role</h2>

      <div class="node-content">
        <div class="pic-bio clearfix"><div class="field field-name-field-professional-title field-type-text field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Henry B. and Anne M.       <div class="node-content">
        <div class="pic-bio clearfix"><div class="field field-name-field-professional-title field-type-text field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Parkman Professor of Divinity and Professor of Comparative Theology </div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p> <a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/people/francis-x-clooney" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Francis X.   <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1371845153' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div id="file-53886" class="file file-image file-image-png">

          <h2 class="element-invisible"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/files/religion/files/religion-footer.png?m=1479879567">religion-footer.png</a></h2>

		<div id="columns" class="clearfix">
			<div class="hg-container">
				<div id="content-column" role="main">
					<div class="content-inner">
					  <div class="breadcrumb"><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/" >HOME</a> <span>&#47;</span> </div>
													              <a name="main-content"></a>
															<header id="main-content-header">
									<a name="main-content"></a>
                    <h1 id="page-title">
                      Undergraduate                    </h1>
                </header>
														
															<!--front panel regions beg-->
								<div id="content-panels" class="at-panel gpanel panel-display content clearfix">
									<div class="region region-content-top"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><div id="block-os-pages-main-content" class="block block-os-pages no-title"  module="os_pages" delta="main_content"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
  
  <div class="block-content content"><article id="node-893786" class="node node-page article clearfix" role="article">
  
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>Harvard’s concentration in the Comparative Study of Religion is a vibrant community comprised of dynamic, devoted students and the nation’s most distinguished teaching faculty in the study of religion.  Students interact regularly with faculty and graduate students who share their interests. The program provides students with an understanding of the religious traditions of the world through study of sacred texts and rituals; philosophy, literature and theology; and the lived experiences and history of participants in the tradition.  Courses engage life’s biggest questions including the meaning of life and death, humanity and divinity, good and evil, sacrifice and community.  Course work exposes students to central concepts in the field such as god(s), ritual, gender, authority, orthodoxy, scripture and prophecy.  Anthropological, historical, philosophical, phenomenological, sociological and literary approaches open religion to closer analysis and deeper understanding.</p>
<p>Students consistently rate our concentration and courses very highly.  Tutorials are small, tailored to student interests and designed to develop and refine students’ ability to analyze texts closely and to write coherently.  Close attention to excellent writing--through drafting, comments and revising--is a priority in our tutorial program. <em><br /><br /></em>Concentrators pursue a wide range of careers after graduation, including business, law, medicine, politics, public service, scholarship, creative art and teaching.  Recent graduates are studying at Harvard Law School, teaching with Teach for America, pursuing graduate work at Cambridge University, practicing medicine and starring in television roles.  Our students consistently report back to us that the understanding of religion, the critical thinking skills, and the refined writing ability they gained in this concentration have been significantly important in making sense of current events and global politics, and in succeeding in their workplaces and local communities.  Most of our graduates have a strong interest in service to their communities and are committed to working in their chosen profession to make the world a better place. </p>
<p><em>The Undergraduate section of this site reflects the information found in the Undergraduate Handbook, which is the standard reference work for requirements, rules, and advising procedures in the Study of Religion and it updated annually. Faculty advisers and tutorial leaders will assume students are familiar with it. Please read its contents carefully.</em></p></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
</div>
  </div></div><div id="block-boxes-1469475875" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_boxes_media no-title"  module="boxes" delta="1469475875"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1469475875' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div id="file-678781" class="file file-html file-html-embed">

          <h2 class="element-invisible"><a href="">A.B. Study of Religion Calendar</a></h2>
      
  
  <div class="content">
    <div class="file-info"></div><div class="field field-name-field-html-code field-type-text-long field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><iframe src="https://calendar.google.com/calendar/embed?title=A.B.%20Study%20of%20Religion%20Calendar&amp;mode=AGENDA&amp;height=400&amp;wkst=1&amp;bgcolor=%23FFFFFF&amp;src=harvard.edu_gknbrjcsb0f1j1sjif3rua58l8%40group.calendar.google.com&amp;color=%23711616&amp;ctz=America%2FNew_York" style="border-width:0" width="600" height="400" frameborder="0" scrolling="no"></iframe></div></div></div>  </div>

  
</div>
</div></div></div>
  </div></div></div></div>									<div class="region region-content-first"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><section id="block-boxes-1374163646" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_boxes_html"  module="boxes" delta="1374163646"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">Guides &amp; Handbooks</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1374163646' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><ul><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/files/religion/files/religious_studies_guide_print_10-1-13.pdf">Guide to Writing in the Study of Religion</a></li>
<li><a href="http://writing.fas.harvard.edu/" target="_blank">Writing Resources at Harvard</a></li>
<li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/files/religion/files/ab_handbook_2016-7_final_0.pdf">Undergraduate Handbook</a> (2016-17)</li>
<li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/files/religion/files/senior_thesis_handbook_2015-16_student.pdf">Senior Thesis Handbook</a> (2015-16)</li>
</ul></div></div></div>
  </div></section><section id="block-boxes-1374515432" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_boxes_html"  module="boxes" delta="1374515432"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">Undergraduate Resources</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1374515432' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><ul><li><a href="http://osl.fas.harvard.edu/icb/icb.do?keyword=k65178&amp;pageid=icb.page305611">Office of Student Life – Student Organizations</a></li>

</ul><p>Register your travel abroad for emergency support:<br /><a href="https://www.globalsupport.harvard.edu/travel-tools">www.globalsupport.harvard.edu/travel-tools</a></p></div></div></div>
  </div></section></div></div>									<div class="region region-content-second"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><section id="block-boxes-1374178945" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_boxes_html"  module="boxes" delta="1374178945"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">Plan of Study Forms for Undergraduates</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1374178945' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><ul><li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/files/religion/files/ab_option_a_2014-15_writeable.doc">Option A: Two Major Traditions in Comparative Context</a></li>
<li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/files/religion/files/ab_option_b_2014-15_writeable.doc">Option B: One Major Tradition in Comparative Context</a></li>
<li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/files/religion/files/ab_option_c_2014-15_writeable.doc">*Option C: Joint Concentration with Religion as the Primary Field</a></li>
<li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/files/religion/files/ab_option_d_2014-15_writeable.doc">*Option D: Joint Concentration with Religion as a Allied Field</a></li>
<li><a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/files/religion/files/ab_secondary_field_2014-15_writeable.doc">Religion as a Secondary Field</a></li>
</ul><p>*Students pursuing a Joint Concentration must also complete the college form<a href="https://studyofreligion.fas.harvard.edu/files/religion/files/joint_conc_app_2_-_without_list_of_programs.pdf"> "Joint Concentration Application".</a></p></div></div></div>
  </div></section></div></div>																	</div>
